description: While some critics fear measures aimed at stemming panic are overzealous, others praise government for managing crisis.
content:
As the world battles the COVID-19 pandemic by focusing on restricting movement, Uzbekistan, which has almost 200 cases and two confirmed fatalities, is stepping up measures to stem panic.
